To get started, enter a Kaspa address in: To get started, enter a Kaspa address in the field above and press 'Fetch'.
Tooltip_api_address: URL template for viewing a specific address on a block explorer.
Tooltip_api_address_names: Endpoint for retrieving a list of officially recognized or community-submitted names for Kaspa addresses.
Tooltip_api_balance: Endpoint to get the current balance of a specific Kaspa address.
Tooltip_api_blockdag_info: Endpoint that provides general information about the blockDAG, like block counts and difficulty.
Tooltip_api_blockreward: Endpoint to check the current reward per block.
Tooltip_api_coinsupply: Endpoint for coin supply details, including circulating and max supply.
Tooltip_api_coingecko: Endpoint for fetching Kaspa prices against various fiat currencies from CoinGecko.
Tooltip_api_full_transactions: Endpoint to fetch a complete list of transactions for a specific address, page by page.
Tooltip_api_halving: Endpoint that provides information about the next halving event.
Tooltip_api_hashrate: Endpoint to get the current network hashrate.
Tooltip_api_kaspad: Endpoint for information about the kaspad node the API is connected to.
Tooltip_api_max_hashrate: Endpoint for the maximum recorded network hashrate.
Tooltip_api_top_addresses: Endpoint for fetching a list of the wealthiest addresses.
Tooltip_api_transaction: URL template for viewing a specific transaction on a block explorer.
Tooltip_archival: Run as an archival node: avoids deleting old block data (Warning: heavy disk usage).
Tooltip_connect: Connect only to the specified peers at startup.
Tooltip_enable-unsynced-mining: Allow the node to accept blocks from RPC while not synced (this flag is mainly used for testing).
Tooltip_externalip: Add a socket address(ip:port) to the list of local addresses we claim to listen on to peers.
Tooltip_ks_blockwait: Time to wait for a new block template (e.g., 3s, 2000ms).
Tooltip_ks_extranonce: Size of the extranonce in bytes (default: 0).
Tooltip_ks_kaspa: The address:port of the kaspad gRPC server (e.g., 127.0.0.1:16110).
Tooltip_ks_log: Enable logging to a file in the same directory.
Tooltip_ks_pow2clamp: Clamp difficulty to powers of 2 (required for ASICs).
Tooltip_ks_sharespermin: Target shares per minute for vardiff (default: 20).
Tooltip_ks_stats: Show hashrate and connection stats in the console.
Tooltip_ks_stratum: The interface:port to listen on for miner connections (e.g., :5555).
Tooltip_ks_vardiffstats: Show vardiff statistics in the console.
Tooltip_listen: Add an interface:port to listen for connections (default all interfaces port: 16111, testnet: 16211).
Tooltip_max-tracked-addresses: Max (preallocated) number of addresses being tracked for UTXO changed events (default: 0).
Tooltip_max_pages: Safety limit on the total number of pages to fetch for a single address.
Tooltip_max_workers: Maximum number of parallel threads for network requests.
Tooltip_network_cache_hours: Hours to keep network data (hashrate, difficulty) before fetching new data.
Tooltip_page_delay: Seconds to wait between fetching pages to avoid rate-limiting.
Tooltip_page_limit: Max transactions to fetch per API request. (Recommended: 100-1000)
Tooltip_perf-metrics: Enable performance metrics: cpu, memory, disk io usage.
Tooltip_perf-metrics-interval-sec: Interval in seconds for performance metrics collection.
Tooltip_price_cache_hours: Hours to keep price data before fetching new data. (e.g., 0.25 = 15 minutes)
Tooltip_ram-scale: Apply a scale factor to memory allocation bounds (e.g., 0.5 for 8GB RAM).
Tooltip_reset-db: Reset database before starting node. It's needed when switching between subnetworks.
Tooltip_retention-period-days: The number of total days of data to keep.
Tooltip_retry_attempts: Number of times to retry a failed API request. (Recommended: 3-5)
Tooltip_rpcmaxclients: Max number of RPC clients for standard connections (default: 128).
Tooltip_rpclisten: Interface:port to listen for gRPC connections (default port: 16110, testnet: 16210).
Tooltip_rpclisten-borsh: Interface:port to listen for wRPC Borsh connections (default port: 17110, testnet: 17210).
Tooltip_rpclisten-json: Interface:port to listen for wRPC JSON connections (default port: 18110, testnet: 18210).
Tooltip_sanity: Enable various sanity checks which might be compute-intensive.
Tooltip_timeout: Max seconds to wait for an API response before failing. (Recommended: 10-30)
Tooltip_uacomment: Comment to add to the user agent.
Tooltip_unsaferpc: Enable RPC commands which affect the state of the node.
Tooltip_utxoindex: Enable the UTXO index (required for explorer functionality).
Tooltip_yes: Answer yes to all interactive console questions.
